lines.text: What do you mean "prove" your love?
Well if you don't know, maybe you'd better ask DAD!

[refering to handbill about protest rally]
In our own printshop! On our own presses! How could this happen?
Well like I said, we're understaffed. Not a bad little job, but the spacing could be a little better here...
Listen, I want to ask you...
You'll ask me *nothing*. It's about time you kids were seen and not heard! 30 seconds, alright, hook up those fire hoses!
